name: Nier:Similis
description:
A student project made for educational purposed trying to recreate the Hacking mini game from Nier: Automata. 

I tried to recreate the Original as closely as I could with my limited knowledge at the time. I've also tried to add some Narrative elements into the game in the form of subtext as this project was a part of my Narrative assessment task.

I had lots of fun learning the various features of Unity for the first time during this project.
